<p>Kuala Lumpur (Malaysian pronunciation: [ˈkualə, -a ˈlumpo(r), -ʊ(r)]), officially the Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur (Malay: Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur) and commonly known as KL, is the national capital and largest city in Malaysia. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=kuala_lumpur">Text from Wikipedia</a></p>
